import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button, Col } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' import { savePaymentMethod } from '../actions/cartActions' import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom' const PaymentScreen = () => { const history = useNavigate() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) const { shippingAddress } = cart if (!shippingAddress) { history('/shipping') } const [paymentMethod, setPaymentMethod] = useState('PayPal') const dispatch = useDispatch() const submitHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault() dispatch(savePaymentMethod(paymentMethod)) history('/placeorder') } return (

Payment Method

Select Method setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} > {/* setPaymentMethod(e.target.value)} > */}
) } export default PaymentScreen
